attributes.action: end the ongoing distraction of the MP expenses scandal by calling a General Election immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British people have utterly lost confidence and trust in members of Parliament due to the ongoing expenses scandal.

This is causing lasting damage to the moral authority of the House of Commons and in the opinion of the undersigned can only be solved by an immediate General Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
